items.prompt: A 1920s journalist character portrait in Mansion of Madness art style. A determined African American woman in her 30s wearing a 1920s reporter's outfit - a tailored blouse, vest, and newsboy cap. She holds a notepad and pencil, with a press badge visible. Dark moody lighting, gothic atmosphere, period-accurate 1920s fashion. Art style matching Mansion of Madness board game - detailed, atmospheric, slightly stylized horror aesthetic.

A 1920s psychotherapist character portrait in Mansion of Madness art style. A warm, thoughtful woman of Middle Eastern descent in her 40s wearing elegant 1920s professional attire - a dark dress with a cardigan, glasses, holding a notebook. She has a compassionate, observant expression. Dark moody lighting, gothic atmosphere, period-accurate 1920s fashion. Art style matching Mansion of Madness board game - detailed, atmospheric, slightly stylized horror aesthetic.

He holds a paintbrush and palette, with an intense, captivated expression. Dark moody lighting, gothic atmosphere, period-accurate 1920s fashion. Art style matching Mansion of Madness board game - detailed, atmospheric, slightly stylized horror aesthetic.
